Detailed Description

This class implements a scaled direction of descent for path-based algorithms.

Scaled direction means that usual direction of descent is divided by second derivative of the objective function with respect to flow move. Scaled direction is usually applied in approach 2 and 3 (These approaches are implemented for algorithms PE and GP, see PathAlgoCreator).
